name: Stickman Spear Shooter
description:
Stickman Spear Shooter is the most lively addictive killing game! This game will let you think ahead before you make any shoot while playing the game levels.

The goal of this shooting game is to defend your castle and try to kill all enemies who are trying to destroy your castle and kill you. Sounds easy? But, would you be able to truly defend king castle from the siege weapons of the enemies? Keep in mind that you should be precise and use the spear to throw spear ball at the enemies and break their military mechanisms and siege towers.

This stickman shooter game is amazingly designed with an awesome environment to give you the best experience while playing. As a player, your task is to concentrate and maintain your focus so that you can shoot the enemies and destroy them. There are many enemies there and they are trying to kill you with their weapons but you should never let them reach that goal or you will lose.

Why choose to play Stickman Spear Shooter on your phone or tablet instead of other killing and stickman fighting games?

Nice:
We made some 2D Cool and smooth high-quality graphics to give you the best experience while playing the greatest shooting game ever! You will enjoy it!

We care about you and that's why we made our game very easy to play so you just need to tap on the screen and pull to charge the spear and select the tension force. Release to launch the projectile into the enemy. Super easy!

With our realistic graphics, you will have the feeling of killing real enemies and not playing a stickman game.

Free:
Our stickman fighting game is FREE and it will stay Free for life, so there is No hidden fees or annual subscription to enjoy one of the best free killing game!

Very wide selection of levels:
Yes! we have a very wide selection of levels in this shooting game. Each level is harder than the previous one and the enemies equipment will be changed to test if you will be really able to defend your castle and kill enemies.

Since the levels are generated randomly and with different level of difficulty, on occasion some might not be possible to complete on the first try.

Brain Challenging:
This game is for intelligent people who want to challenge their brain playing a free addictive attack and shoot game.
Perfect for time killing, leisure, brain challenge, brain challenging, bonding with family and friends. Good for kids too.
Have fun with friends and others and don't forget to compete with them.

For everyone:
Stickman Spear Shooter is a free game and it can be played by Adults and Teens. Your whole family can play it and they will enjoy attacking the enemies.

Updated regularly:
Another reason to play our stickman shooter game is that we have a good developers team and they will update this game regularly to bring you with the best experiences and updates.

We will keep adding more levels very soon.

Different modes:
Once you install our game, you can enjoy playing within different modes. The modes that we are inside our game are Deathmatch, War mode, and Challenge mode. We will add more modes very soon!

Play it anytime and anywhere:
Want to play our game anytime and anywhere? It's possible because we have a smart offline mode that will let you play our game even if you don't have a 3G, 4G or Wi-fi internet connection.

Stickman Spear Shooter is a cool and insanely shooting game to test your skills. Get hours of fun by playing this awesome shooting game, you will fall in love with it, a moment you start playing it. This game offers hours of fun that is free of any charge.

What are you waiting for? Download Stickman Spear Shooter game and enjoy defending your castle.
We are always striving to provide the best user experience for our players. We are also looking for your feedback, suggestion or recommendation.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
